attributes.action: grant a knighthood to Stephen fry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Fry has served the country well over the last two decades bringin joy to all

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
